description.en: A question where students can select multiple correct answers from the available options.
description.nl: Een vraag waarbij studenten meerdere juiste antwoorden kunnen selecteren uit de beschikbare opties.

generation.instructions: Settings should look like this: {"options": ["Option 1", "Option 2", "Option 3"], "correctAnswer": ["Option 2", "Option 3"]}. Make sure the `correctAnswer` is always set, and EXACTLY matches the corresponding values from the `options` array, and that all options are unique. Also include exactly one scoring criteria, which should just be 'Correct answer selected', and be worth at least one point unless specified otherwise.

settings.name: Multiple choice answer options
settings.description: An array of option strings that represent the choices to the student. Each value can contain HTML.

settings.name: Correct answer(s)
settings.description: An array of strings of the correct answer values, matching the `value` field of the options. There can be multiple correct answers. Needs to be an exact match to one or more of the options, including punctuation and capitalisation!
Whether to show the answer options in random order each time.
